column4: this is rediculous, i've never had an issue getting nvidia drivers to work
they were JUST working, but a kernel update broke it and it will not fix, i've reinstalled the drivers, reinstalled restricted modules, i don't know what else to do
the nvidia driver is even loaded, lists in lsmod
but which version? I saw that issue recently, and it is a conflict between the nvidia-glx-new  and Nvidia packaged kernel module. You'll find a message with the version problem in /var/log/kern.log
